help-file.title: DEATHLORD
help-file.content:
The Deathlord is a creature of destruction and doom, it thrives on the moments when 'life' hangs in the delicate balance of fate. Their very souls feed from the powers of death and decay, bringing the chill of the undead to the world around them.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 21st level: Call of the Grave 31st level: Embrace Death 36th level: Soul Trap
Please note, this is a new spec, some sections may still be under review and development, and as such are liable to changes.
